item.description:
Important! The plan is to meet at Nice Slice(267 Thayer St.) @ 1PM to get our pizza and then go to the park.
The park is just down the hill from Thayer Street and has picnic tables or you can spread out a blanket.

Nice Slice on Thayer Street in Providence sells many types of vegan pizzas ( http://www.niceslice.... ). Check out the website and get an idea of what you'd like to order. Maybe even call in your order before arriving?

My cell # (401)649-3514 - Kyon (Key-own)

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Lunch @ Nice Slice (Vegan Pizza)
